contentList.content: Your Clubs, Glaives, Greatclubs, Warhammers, Javelins, Maces, Morningstars, Pikes, Quarterstaffs, Sickles, Spears or Tridents becomes magical: they deal [1], and use your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability</LSTag> for <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.

Your Clubs, Glaives, Greatclubs, Warhammers, Javelins, Maces, Morningstars, Pikes, Quarterstaffs, Sickles, Spears or Tridents becomes magical: they deal [1], and add your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability</LSTag> for <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
Creature's weapon is magical and deals [1]. <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> add the wielder's <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability Modifier</LSTag>.
